title: My Lello Hair Elastics Hair Ties, Professional Grade Ponytail Holders - 100 Pack Variety Rainbow B
description: MyLello no damage no metal elastic hair ties / ponytail holders are super soft and stretchy for a comfortable and secure hold for all hair types. The hair elastics professional strength (4mm thick hair band) measure 2.2 inches and this larger size is perfect for full ponytails, cheer teams, and for girls with long or thick hair and should easily allow you to wrap it 3 times or more. They also work well for man bun hair ties / hair binders. Wear them alone or decorate them with hairbows and other embellishments! These stretchy stayput hair ties are metal free and will not snag, snarl or rip your hair and thus are "ouchless" and non-damaging to hair! With the multiple color options available, you can coordinate with your outfits and always have the perfect match! The elastic ponytail holders work great for all hair styles from twist and tuck, to braids. Save money by purchasing in our bulk value packs and have enough to keep in all your important places: purse, desk drawer, backpack, locker, and bathroom. The bands are 4mm thick with a strong seam, allowing you to stretch them for a tight hold.

title: 10 Pcs Furry Hair Ties
Satin Scrunchies, silky material, stretchy, does not pull hair
